channel.title: Spawn on Ksbigbass
channel.description: Recent content in Spawn on Ksbigbass

item.title: MLF: Big Fish Galore: Raleigh
item.description:
MLF: Lake Jordan, Raleigh NC Big Fish Galore

MLF: Lake Jordan, Raleigh NC Big Fish Galore! Wow! Over 82 Pounds in Shotgun Round 1 for Pro Kelly Jordon. KJ shows us just how many big fish are in Lake Jordan, NC.

Jordan reservoir covers 13,940 acres with a shoreline of 180 miles.  

MLF Pro Kelly Jordon

item.title: Buzzbait conditions
item.description:
Buzzbait conditions: The conditions were perfect for a buzzbait bite — post-frontal with a nice chop on the water, just enough to break up the profile of my bait. It was a textbook presentation.

I want the bass to eat topwater baits but I am not sure the conditions will allow, but if it does….Wow!

Buzzbait conditions:

When to:

Low skies, low light, and a slightly cooler day than you’ve been having, the topwater bite turns on
